data.title: ​Phnom Penh retail real estate market remains quiet​

data.title: Candid Conversation: Cambodia’s Ken Loo - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Despite a series of setbacks over the past years, the Cambodian apparel exports have finally made some progress in the first five months of 2024, with exports up by more than 22 percent over the previous year.

data.title: Revived Cambodian Nationalism Threatens to Undermine ‘Special’ Relationship With Vietnam - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Anti-Vietnamese resentment has spelled an end to a cross-border cooperation agreement with Vietnam and Laos.

data.title: QR payments expand in Thailand, Malaysia and Cambodia - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cross-border links and tourist services add to region's growing digital money usage.

data.title: Green bonds, red flags: Cambodia’s microfinance crisis deepens amid sustainability push - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Microfinance institutions in Cambodia, accused of predatory lending, are pivoting to green bonds while borrowers, burdened by debt and climate impacts, struggle to survive.

data.title: ​Korea to pump in US$6.5 bn in 2025 to contend in global chip race​
data.description: ​​Korea to pump in US$6.5 bn in 2025 to contend in global chip race​

data.title: Thai and Vietnamese tourists make up over half of foreign arrivals in Cambodia - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Nearly two million Thai and Vietnamese tourists visited Cambodia in the first seven months of 2024, a rise of over 20% compared to the same period in 2023.

data.title: Little-known “FIRM 614” confirmed as only licensed importer of gaming equipment into Cambodia as government tightens regulations - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: The operators of casinos in Cambodia will have until the end of this year to register all gaming equipment on their properties or face having it removed under new regulations governing the supply, import and operation of such equipment across the country. However, questions still remain over the process going forward, and how suppliers will […]

data.title: NagaCorp-commissioned review finds Cambodia’s main short-term risks are economic, not political - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: An independent review of investment risks found that Cambodia’s biggest risks in 2024 are economic rather than political.

data.title: Energy partnership between Thailand, Cambodia back on the table - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Phnom Penh is optimistic that talks with Paetongtarn Shinawatra’s government and historic ties with Thaksin will result in a deal beneficial to both sides.

data.title: Asics Said It Helped Remedy Labor Abuse in Cambodia. Activists Disagree. - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Labor advocates have poked holes at Asics’s claims that a prosecuted and jailed union leader at one of its Cambodian suppliers was reinstated to his former position following the overturning of his conviction.

data.title: Malaysia, Cambodia launch QR linkage for instant cross-border payments - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Central banks of Malaysia and Cambodia on Thursday launched the QR payment linkage that would allow consumers and merchants in both countries to make and receive instant payments. RELATED Under the first of the two-phase rollout, Cambodians can make instant retail payments in Malaysia by scanning DuitNow QR codes displayed by merchants using their mobile […]

data.title: Big brands urge Cambodian govt to drop independent union probe - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Adidas and Puma among big brands cautioning Phnom Penh over free speech.

data.title: NagaCorp flags $411M GGR in nine-month period - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodian gaming operator NagaCorp announced that for the nine months ending September 30th, 2024, the group achieved gross gaming revenue of $411 million, an increase of 8.4 percent year-on-year.

data.title: Cambodian Microfinance Loans Based on Rising Land Prices Point to Further NPL Increase - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: According to forthcoming research, the rate of non-performing loans at the country’s microfinance lenders is higher than publicly disclosed.

data.title: ​LOLC Cambodia Strengthening Financial Literacy Awareness Efforts ​
data.description: ​​LOLC Cambodia Strengthening Financial Literacy Awareness Efforts ​

data.title: Cambodia set for 5.8% growth in 2024; inflation forecast lowered: ADB - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Inflation projections have been lowered to 0.5 per cent due to slow food price increases and declining fuel costs.

data.title: Cambodia tourism chief touts ties with Hong Kong as ‘shining example’, lauds trade surge - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Participants at the Hong Kong-Asean Summit 2024 were updated on the strong growth potential for tourism between Hong Kong and Cambodia.

data.title: Cambodia's foreign trade up 16.5% in January-August period - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Cambodia's international trade volume reached US$36.48 billion in the first eight months of 2024, up 16.5 per cent from US$31.32 billion over the same period last year.

data.title: Cambodian fishermen turn to raising eels as Tonle Sap lake runs out of fish - The Cambodia Daily
data.description: Em Phat, 53, studies his eel tanks with the intensity of a man gambling with his livelihood.
